name: Filiam Dei
description:
Filiam Dei is a small PlayStation Move / Mouse Asymmetric Cooperative 3D Puzzle Platformer in which a God helps free their daughter. You can rotate the room using the PSMoves connected to the computer, and the daughter with a PS4/Xbox 360 contorller. There is as well a MOUSE VERSION AVAILABLE.

Please, note that the PSMove version is only for 64bit systems, and require you to set up the controller following this simple tutorial (libusb driver for the camera): https://github.com/HipsterSloth/psmove-unity5/wiki...

PSMove Controls:

Zoom: Hold both X Buttons and move the controllers closer or further away to each other to control Zoom. Rotation: See How To Play inside the game.

Roll: Move Up/Down 1 PSMove while holding both Triggers to control the Roll Pitch: Move Up/Down both PSMove while holding both Triggers to control the Pitch Yaw: Pull/Push 1 PSMove while holding both Triggers to control the Yaw

Mouse/Keyboard Controls:

Zoom: Up/Down Arrow Keys

Rotation:

Roll: Lef/Right Arrow Keys

Pitch: Hold Left Click and Swipe Up/Down

Yaw: Hold Left Click and Swipe Left/Right
